review:
Amazing doctor with extremely high experience and a wonderful human being. Always positive and ready to assist any patients. 
Will strongly recommend him to everyone who has any heart issues or interested to do ECG or stress tests.
********* ******. Very warm and approachable. He has been my husbands cardiologist  for many years now.

tags: Value for money,Treatment satisfaction,Explanation of the health issue,
